#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
//#include<conio.h>
int main()
{
	int t;
	long long n,k,u[500000],sum,i;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sum=0;
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&u[i]);
		}
		sort(u,u+n);
		i=n-1;
		while(k--)
		{
			sum=sum+u[i];
			i--;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",sum);
	}
	//getch();
	return 0;
}
